doc.title: Elder Scrolls III: Tribunal
doc.plot: Mournhold, capital of Morrowind, is a city rife with strife. As if the conflict between Imperial and Temple policies wasn't bad enough, strange and violent mechanical creatures are appearing within the city walls, daily. All signs point to Sotha Sil, one of the living Gods of the Tribunal. Why would a reclusive God send creatures to attack his people?
